title: That new PD change on PBE looks... kind of aids.
body:
https://www.surrenderat20.net/2019/01/125-pbe-update-more-tentative-balance.html

The offensive stats aren't the best, but the new Lifeline passive is going to be aids.

Lament is gone (so no more dueling), but that shield scales from 240 - 600 in strength.

at least Spectral Waltz is staying, even if it's not as reliable on shorter ranged champions as it once was due to requiring you to hit them now.

I'm hoping I'm wrong and the item doesn't get gutted, but if I'm being honest, I'd rather PD stay as it is and Lifeline go to a different item _if we have to have it at all_.
